entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is fighting against Death Eaters. He is described as seeing red hair flying in front of him and yelling 'Impedimenta!'.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is locked in combat with Amycus, a lumpy Death Eater. She is dodging hexes thrown at her.

entities.name: amykus
entities.description: Amycus is a lumpy Death Eater who is throwing hex after hex at Ginny while giggling and enjoying the sport.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is battling a separate Death Eater along with Professor McGonagall and Lupin.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is battling a separate Death Eater.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is battling a separate Death Eater along with Ron and Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is fighting an enormous blond wizard who is sending curses flying in all directions.

entities.name: the enormous blond wizard
entities.description: The enormous blond wizard is sending curses flying in all directions, causing damage to the surroundings.
